1: <pb/><e>Sb'itaj jun b'it tic ayic tz'och yopisio jun templo. Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj David.</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, tzach in b'itej yed' in vach' lolonel, yujto ix in a sic'q'ue vaan d'a scal in nivan yaelal, maj in a cha b'uchjoc yuj eb' ayoch ajc'olal d'ayin.</t>
2: <t>Mamin, in Diosal ach, ix in c'an a colval, ix ac'an b'oxoc in c'ool.</t>
3: <t>Mamin, a ach ton ix in a colel d'a chamel. Ix ac' in q'uinal, maj in a chab'atlaj d'a scal eb' chamnac.</t>
4: <t>B'itanan̈ec d'a Jehová, mach ex to schon̈ab' ex, b'itejec yujto an̈ej Te Nivan Yelc'ochi.</t>
5: <t>Yujto junn̈ej rato ay yoval sc'ool, axo svach'c'olal ayn̈ejec' d'a masanil tiempo. Vach'chom tzon̈ oc' d'ac'valil, axo yic sq'uin̈ib'i sja co tzalajc'olal.</t>
6: <t>Ayic te vach' vaji, ix in na' icha tic: Malaj b'aq'uin̈ ol in telvoc yuj junoc tas, xin chi.</t>
7: <t>Mamin Jehová, yuj val svach'il a c'ool, ix in ac'canoch b'aj malaj tas tzin ic'ani. Palta ayic ix ic'anel a b'a d'ayin, ix somchajcanel in c'ool.</t>
8: <t>Mamin, ix ach vavtej, ix valan in b'a d'ayach:</t>
9: <t>¿Tasto a ganar d'ayin, q'uinaloc tato tzin chami, tzin mucchaji? Man̈xo ol yal-laj ach sb'itan eb' toxo ix och pococal. Man̈ ol yal pax laj yalan vach' lolonel eb' d'ayach yuj svach'il tas ix a b'o'o, xin chi.</t>
10: <t>Mamin Jehová, ab' val tas svala', oc'oc val a c'ool d'ayin. Mamin, ochan̈n̈ej ved'oc.</t>
11: <t>Ix ac'an q'uexmaj in yaelal d'a tzalajc'olal. Ix ic'anel in cusc'olal, ix ac'ancanoch c'apac pichul yic q'uin̈ in pichuloc.</t>
12: <t>Yuj val chi' jun, ach Jehová in Diosal, max yal-laj vem numan. Tzin b'itan d'ayach d'a aloj vach' lolonel yed' ac'oj yuj diosal d'ayach d'a masanil tiempo.</t>
